Package org.gvsig.quickInfo

Class Summary
AboutQuickInfoExtension Quick Information extension of the Consejería de Medio Ambiente de la Junta de Castilla y León.
FormatDecimalNumber Class that has a method to format decimal numbers with the criterions to display them as calculated fields in the QuickInfoListener tool.
GeometryIDInfo  
QuickInfoFLayerSelected Stores the information selected of a layer's point.
QuickInfoToolExtension gvSIG extension.
TestFormatDecimalNumber Tests the method FormatDecimalNumber
TestQuickInfoFLayerSelected Tests the generation of an XML document of tool tip text according the style of the "quick information" tool.
TestQuickInfoToolTipText Tests the creation of tool tip text according the style of the "quick information" tool.
